FormattedText.htmlText: - MDR2, MDR3, MDR6-MDR8: Add new market units ME_N, ME_S, APJ_SEA.
- Remove links to JAM pages by Workzone links.
- MDR6-MDR8: Rename filter 'Case Tag' by 'MCC Tag'.
- MDR1: Complete removal of MDR1 from MDR Dashboard Builder and Analyzer.
- MDR6-MDR8: Add all (old and new) case categories (ZS01 + ZS02).
- All Dashboards: Remove service team 33792482 from filter list.
- MDR6-MDR8: Provide filtering with MCC tags.
- Correct errors in URL generation and for manual input.
- All Dashboards: Remove service teams 33767454 and 33792483 from filter list.
- MDR2: Remove PERC activities (ZS88) from filter list.
- All Dashboards: Rename service teams in filter list.
- MDR2: Add parameter dispcat to display Category - Result - Reason.
- MDR9: Remove filters and parameters for MDR9 from MDR Dashboard Builder and Analyzer due to retirement of this dashboard.
- MDR1/MDR2: Renaming of ZS46 category filters (Removal of 'AGS' + 'DBS').
- MDR6-MDR8: New values for SAP Involvement filter.
- MDR3: Additional status values for cross issues: In Evaluation (E0016), Addressed (E0017), Completed (E0018).
- MDR1/MDR2: Include display parameter disp_MU (display market unit).
- MDR1/MDR2: Rename ZS46 activity status from 'In MCC Dep Rooms' into 'In MCC Focus Teams'.
- Error correction for switch between user-friendly and technical view on 'Analyze' tab.
- Enhancement of URL check in 'Analyze' tab.
- All MDRs: Adoption of service team and market unit filters.
- MDR1/MDR2/MDR3: Adoption of process type filters and related status filters.
- First version of MDR Dashboard Builder and Analyzer.
